question:
You are living in a city in a foreign country, and a friend from your home country is soon coming tovisit you for several days. Write an email to your friend,

-asking him or her to bring some things from home which you need-saying why you need them-making arrangements to meet
text: Hurray! I am super excited  to hear about your visit. Finally, we're going to meet after two long years. I've made so many plans for both of us already and eagerly waiting for your arrival. I'm wondering if you can pick up a few things from my house and bring them with you.

The first is the old laptop which has some essential documents related to the past work experiences I require for some official reason, and the other is a few Indian dresses I needed to wear at my friends' wedding functions in September.

I hope the above is manageable for you and won't be a problem. In the meantime, do send me the details of your arrival time because  I personally want to come and pick you up from the airport, and then we will directly head towards a club, where I have already planned a welcome party for you.
I can't wait to meet you. Bye and take care!
